Combat Wild Shape: Can use Wild Shape as a bonus action
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Nature's Sanctuary: Beasts and plants cannot attack self (DC 16 Wisdom neg for 24 hr)
Primal Strike: Attacks while using Wild Shape count as magical
Tavern Brawler: Can use a bonus action to grapple after a successful unarmed or improvised attack
Save Proficiency: Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 3; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 6; Strength: 0; Wisdom: 8
Save Notes:
Land's Stride: Has advantage vs. impeding plants
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Nature's Ward: Has immunity to disease, poison, and elemental and fey charm and fright

Web (D2 [Circle Of The Land (Underdark)] Conj): R60' 20' cube restrains creatures (save Dexterity neg and Strength frees) for concentration up to 1 hr; burning the web inflicts 2d4 HP fire
Magic Notes:
Archdruid: Can use Wild Shape at will
Bonus Cantrip (Circle Of The Land): Knows an additional Druid cantrip
Circle Forms: Can Wild Shape into a CR 6 creature
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips/Can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Archdruid: Casting spells requires no verbal, somatic, or cost-free material components
Beast Spells: Can cast spells during Wild Shape
Circle Spells: Has access to terrain-specific spells
Combat Wild Shape: While using Wild Shape, can spend a spell slot and use a bonus action to regain 1d8 hit points per slot level
Elemental Adept (Cold): Spells that inflict cold damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Wild Shape: Can expend 2 Wild Shape uses to become an elemental
Natural Recovery: Can recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest once per long rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the druid spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Thousand Forms: Can cast Alter Self at will
Wild Shape: Can transform into a CR 6 creature for 10 hr unlimited times per short rest
Notes
Validation Errors: Selectable Feature Allocation: 1 available vs. 9 allocated
